full_text: OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY BARRY E. KRISCHER STATE ATTORNEY July 13, 2006 GRAND JURY TO: INV GREGORY A. PARKINSON #8717 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 345 S. COUNTY ROAD PALM BEACH, FL 33480 FAX :835-4736 Re: Your Case No. 05-0368 Dear Inv Parkinson: The above-styled case has been set before the Palm Beach County Grand Jury for investigation on 07/19/2006, at 9:00 AM, in Room 4A, Juvenile Courts Building of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida. Please call our office upon receipt of this notice at 355-7363 (Bobbie Payne). This NOTICE TO APPEAR is being sent to you in lieu of a Grand Jury Subpoena. We expect you to honor this Notice since, as a police officer, you are integrally involved in the prosecution of the above-styled defendant. Again, you are cautioned that this NOTICE TO APPEAR is being treated by our Office as a Grand Jury Subpoena and requires your cooperation in order to conduct a successful prosecution. Sincerely, LANNA BELOHLAVEK Assistant State Attorney Florida Bar No. 0776726 xc: Official Court File State Attorney's Work File 401 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401-4209 (561) 355-7100 07/26/17 Page 119 of 124 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031840

text_blocks.content: GREAT SEAL OF THE STATE OF FLORIDA
OFFICE OF THE STATE ATTORNEY FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT OF FLORIDA IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY BARRY E. KRISCHER STATE ATTORNEY
GRAND JURY TO: INV GREGORY A. PARKINSON #8717 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 345 S. COUNTY ROAD PALM BEACH, FL 33480 FAX :835-4736 Re: Your Case No. 05-0368

Dear Inv Parkinson: The above-styled case has been set before the Palm Beach County Grand Jury for investigation on 07/19/2006, at 9:00 AM, in Room 4A, Juvenile Courts Building of the Palm Beach County Courthouse, 205 North Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida. Please call our office upon receipt of this notice at 355-7363 (Bobbie Payne). This NOTICE TO APPEAR is being sent to you in lieu of a Grand Jury Subpoena. We expect you to honor this Notice since, as a police officer, you are integrally involved in the prosecution of the above-styled defendant. Again, you are cautioned that this NOTICE TO APPEAR is being treated by our Office as a Grand Jury Subpoena and requires your cooperation in order to conduct a successful prosecution.
Assistant State Attorney Florida Bar No. 0776726 xc: Official Court File State Attorney's Work File
401 N. Dixie Highway, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401-4209 (561) 355-7100

additional_notes: The document is a letter from the Office of the State Attorney to Inv Gregory A. Parkinson regarding a grand jury investigation. The letter is dated July 13, 2006, and is signed by Lanna Belohlavek, Assistant State Attorney. The document has a stamp of the Great Seal of the State of Florida and contains handwritten text.
